content: I know we talked about display all the invariants in the snapshot view only the new ones in Diff view. Where are we with that one. voted? ETA on applying? Condition profile could benefit from this since lots of 'em there.
Is that just waiting on someone to code that in the publisher to output a new fragment?
(as a subset of the existing one)

Changing code in the publisher is the first step. We need to spit out new fragments for terminology, constraints, and data dictionary for the different views. Also need to update the current "mustSupport" view to incorporate additional data elements.
